replies.body:
"Make fights fair so ping doesn't mean you win"
I don't think it's possible to make PVP fair to everyone.
We all have different connections, on some servers we have great connections and on others we have terrible ones.

No matter how balanced you make PVP in any game, you can only fix you connectivity to a certain extent.
If you live in Australia and play on an American server, you're not going to have the best connection.
Sometimes bad connection isn't the game's fault. It's your fault because you're playing on a server that's hosted half a world away.

Even if you were living 1 Kilometre away from the host, it also depends on your computer and how good it is for playing games.

There're a lot of factors that go into lag and why people get it worse than others.
